definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: II. [[חפר]] (√ of foll.; cf. Ar. s.epar peep, twitter whistle (usu. of bird; onomatop.); As. ṣapâru is cry, howl: NH [[חִפּוֹר]] = BH, so Ph. [[חפר]] Targum [[חִפַּר]], Syr. 9us.fuwrun, Mand. [[חיפאר]], [[חיפרא]] Nö:M § 102; also Ar.  sparrow, etc., and (perh.) As. iṣṣuru, bird).
